title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13ยง 10.7 - Annual renewal for FINRA member broker-dealers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13ยง 10.7 - Annual renewal for FINRA member broker-dealers

State Regulations
(a) An initial single renewal invoice f or the renewal of broker-dealer and salesperson's registrations will be
sent by the CRD system to each firm before the end of each year. (b) Each broker-dealer shall pay the
invoice amount, pursuant to the fee schedule set forth in this Part, directly to FINRA before the payment date indicated on the renewal
invoice. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. &
Regs. Tit. 13ยง
10.7

Amended

New York State Register July 3, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 27, eff. 7/3/2018

Amended

New York State Register December 2, 2020/Volume
XLII, Issue 48, eff. 12/2/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
